video_title: How To Breathe When Stressed or Anxious - Dr. Julie Smith #Shorts
transcript:
you know when you're really stressed or
anxious and your heart is pounding and
people tell you to take deep breaths
well here's why that could be doing more
harm than good see your heart rate is
directly linked to how you breathe
so if you want to slow your heart rate
down and your stress response
you need to take longer more vigorous
out breaths like this
[Music]
and repeat and over time your stress
response and your body will calm down
